    <<<<<<< HEAD:docs/com/stuypulse/stuylib/streams/filters/OrderedLowPassFilter.html
    Simple implementation of an Exponential Moving Average This is not time dependant, so the values will change if you change the rate that you call this filter, the filter will not adapt for that.
    =======
    A filter that takes in real time inputs and profiles it into an S Curve. This is done with time dependant filters to make sure that no matter how many times you call it a second, the resulting profile is the same.
>>>>>>> cee2d99de4addd2fc4793c4f899a30e81eba93c5:docs/com/stuypulse/stuylib/streams/filters/SCurve.html
